messages.content: Use the weaver_activate_glamour tool with weaveId "demo-txt2img" and manifestId "darkroom-metaphor"

I'll activate the "darkroom-metaphor" glamour theme for your weave.Perfect! The "Darkroom Photography" glamour theme has been activated for your weave. All visual assets were ready and the theme is now live. Your text-to-image workflow will now be visualized through the metaphor of a darkroom photography process rather than the loom metaphor.

The frontend should immediately display your workflow using darkroom imagery and terminology - showing the flow from concept to final photograph through the various stages of the photographic development process.

result.message: Glamour "Darkroom Photography" activated with all assets ready.
